name: Stories of the Subconscious (Demo)
description:
This game project was made for the Business Professionals of America 2023 "Software Development Team" Virtual event.

This game has frankly...been demanding on all of our psyches.

We hope it's worth it though.

Enjoy!

Stories of the Subconscious is a short, sweet, top-down RPG made in Godot. You travel from a train, a town, a clock, a library. Surely there can be nothing wrong.

Soundtrack available here:
https://smolyoshino.bandcamp.com/album/stories-of-the-subconscious
https://soundcloud.com/smolyoshino/sets/stories-of-the-subconscious
